translation.en: ♪ Jingle bell Jingle bell, jingle bell rock ♪
Okay.
Happy holidays.
-Oh. Hi, Molly. -How are you?
Good. Did you decide on catering for the city hall weekly dinners?
translation.de: Gut. Steht fest, wer das Catering fürs wöchentliche Rathausdinner übernimmt?

translation.en: We did, and we're going with the Bradford Bros.
translation.de: Ja, und wir haben die Bradford Bros. gewählt.

translation.en: They offered us a discount on a surf-and-turf we just couldn't pass up.
translation.de: Ihr Rabatt auf Surf and Turf war einfach unwiderstehlich.

translation.en: I understand. If you need anything, you know where to find me.
translation.de: Das verstehe ich. Wenn Sie was brauchen, sagen Sie Bescheid.

translation.en: Molly's Menu Magic: you name it, we cater it.
translation.de: Molly's Menu Magic: Wir erfüllen jeden Wunsch.

translation.en: -[chuckles] Bye. -Bye, Molly.
"Committed to food excellence."
-How'd it go? -Good.
Chamber of Commerce loved the sandwiches and cookies.
translation.de: Die Handelskammer fand Sandwiches und Cookies toll.

translation.en: They placed a standing lunch order for their monthly meeting.
translation.de: Sie bestellen Lunch zu jedem monatlichen Meeting.

translation.en: That's great.
But we lost city hall weekly dinners to the Bradford Bros.
translation.de: Aber wir haben die Rathausdinners an die Bradford Bros. verloren.

translation.en: What? No!
Adding insult to injury, those were all over town.
translation.de: Und zum Hohn hängen die überall herum.

translation.en: That was actually on the front door.
They would love getting every catering job, even if it meant putting us out of business.
translation.de: Die nehmen jeden Catering-Job an, selbst wenn sie uns damit ruinieren.

translation.en: Well, good thing we put out the magnets before the holiday season.
translation.de: Gut, dass wir die Magnete vorher verteilt haben.

translation.en: Those were a brilliant idea because no one throws magnets away, unlike…
translation.de: Brillante Idee. Niemand wirft Magnete weg, im Gegensatz zu…

translation.en: -Any new calls? -No.
I should probably get in line to see Santa with all the other kids in town.
translation.de: Ich sollte mich wie alle Kinder bei Santa anstellen.

translation.en: If you think that'll work, I'll come with you.
translation.de: Wenn das funktioniert, komme ich mit.

translation.en: Okay, there. What do you think?
You are amazing.
You know, it's just missing one thing.
translation.de: Aber… da fehlt nur ein Detail.

translation.en: -[Molly] There. -You are amazing.
I love it. I'm gonna go drop it off.
Great. I'll start on the quiches. Oh, I am meeting my brother for dinner.
translation.de: Gut. Ich mache mich an die Quiches. Oh, und ich gehe mit meinem Bruder essen.

translation.en: -Do you mind locking up after? -Oh, yeah. No problem.
-Tell Kyle I say hi. -I will.
Are you sure you can't join us for Christmas in the Keys?
translation.de: Kannst du nicht mit uns in den Keys feiern?

translation.en: The beach house has more than enough room.
I wish I could. I have a couple holiday orders.
translation.de: Ich würde gern, aber ich habe einige Bestellungen.

translation.en: I can't afford to cancel them. We're proud of you, baby sis.
translation.de: -Die kann ich nicht stornieren. -Wir sind stolz auf dich, Schwesterchen.

translation.en: You're really making a go of your catering company. Well, I've sunk every penny I have into it.
translation.de: -Du wirst mit dem Catering Erfolg haben. -Da steckt all mein Geld drin.

translation.en: It's my lifelong dream. I… I can't afford to fail.
translation.de: Das war immer mein Traum. Das darf nicht schiefgehen.

translation.en: It hasn't even been a year and you're already too busy for the annual Frost family Christmas vacation.
translation.de: Kein Jahr, und du hast zu viel zu tun für den Frost-Weihnachtsurlaub.

translation.en: We'll celebrate Christmas when I'm back.
translation.de: Wir feiern Weihnachten, wenn ich zurück bin.

translation.en: [Kyle] Is that…
That's my ex and his new girlfriend.
translation.de: Mein Ex und seine neue Freundin.

translation.en: I thought he was a decent guy. What happened?
translation.de: Ich fand ihn ganz nett. Was war los?

translation.en: We weren't on the same page and it took me much longer than it should have
translation.de: Wir passten nicht zueinander, und ich brauchte zu lange,

translation.en: to realize that. And he refused to try new food.
translation.de: um das zu merken. Und er probierte kein Essen.

translation.en: In my experience, the three Cs of a healthy relationship
translation.de: Erfahrungsgemäß gehören zu einer gesunden Beziehung

translation.en: are communication, commitment, and compromise.
Okay. Well, I will remember that when I decide to dive back into the dating pool.
translation.de: Daran werde ich denken, wenn ich wieder in den Dating-Pool springe.

translation.en: I just want you to be happy.
translation.de: Ich will, dass du glücklich bist.

translation.en: If I can make Molly's Menu Magic a success,
translation.de: Wenn Molly's Menu Magic erfolgreich wird,

translation.en: I will be as happy as a kid on Christmas morning.
translation.de: bin ich so glücklich wie ein Kind zu Weihnachten.

translation.en: [British accent] Welcome home, Mr. Harrison.
Or should I say Mr. Jacob?
[British accent] Very funny, Robert.
[laughing, American accent] Oh, Cars, it's good to see you.
-It is good to see you too. -Once a year doesn't seem enough.
Not much use for event photographers around here.
-Do you have any luggage? -No. I'll get it later.
translation.de: -Hast du Gepäck? -Nein. Das hole ich später.

translation.en: Where is she?
She's in the library putting the finishing touches on the Christmas tree.
translation.de: Sie vollendet den Schmuck am Weihnachtsbaum in der Bibliothek.

translation.en: Okay. I'm gonna catch up with you later.
I wanna surprise her.
There.
Now you look perfect.
[gasps] Carson!
I'm so glad you're home.
translation.de: So schön, dass du da bist.

translation.en: Oh, I'm so glad to be back.
You don't normally come until the morning of the Christmas Gala.
translation.de: Du kommst sonst erst am Morgen der Weihnachtsgala.

translation.en: Well, my show in Milan ended early, so…
translation.de: Meine Show in Mailand endete früher, also…

translation.en: I'm glad, and I expect full photo approval.
translation.de: Ich freue mich, und keine Fotos ohne meine Genehmigung.

translation.en: -Oh, that goes without saying. -[laughs]
-Are you hungry? -Uh, no.
I'll make myself something later if I get hungry.
translation.de: Ich mache mir dann später was.

translation.en: Since when do you cook?
Well, I'm a whiz in the kitchen with anything to do with mixing milk or water.
translation.de: Ich bin ein Zauberer in der Küche beim Mixen von Milch oder Wasser.

translation.en: Just the basic things.
Shall I show you the plans for this year's Christmas Gala?
translation.de: Soll ich dir die Pläne für die Weihnachtsgala zeigen?

translation.en: It's pretty much the same every year, isn't it?
Tell you what, next year when you take over the foundation,
translation.de: Wenn du nächstes Jahr die Stiftung übernimmst,

translation.en: you can change things up however you like.
translation.de: kannst du ändern, was du willst.

translation.en: I am not taking over the foundation.
One of the cousins will be much better.
translation.de: Eine meiner Cousinen passt viel besser.

translation.en: The cousins have too many responsibilities as it is
translation.de: Deine Cousinen haben so schon zu viel Verantwortung

translation.en: and are already stretched too thin.
Tell you what, you're tired. We will discuss this at another time.
translation.de: Jetzt bist du müde. Wir diskutieren das ein anderes Mal.

translation.en: That sounds good.
Carson, I'm glad you're home.
translation.de: Carson, ich bin froh, dass du da bist.

translation.en: So am I.
Tell me about Milan.
-Morning. -Good morning.
Would you like some juice or a Danish?
translation.de: Willst du Saft oder ein Plunderstück?

translation.en: Uh, no. Just some tea.
Ah, I got it. You don't have to take care of me.
translation.de: Schon gut. Du musst dich nicht um mich kümmern.

translation.en: It's my job to take care of you.
Maybe it's time to settle down in one place?
translation.de: Ist es nicht Zeit, dich niederzulassen?

translation.en: Wow. That was an amazing impression of Aunt Jean.
translation.de: Wow. Du ahmst Tante Jean gut nach.

translation.en: I may be parroting her concerns, but I think of you like my own nephew.
translation.de: Vielleicht plappere ich ihr nach, aber für mich bist du wie mein eigener Neffe.

translation.en: I know, but I enjoy not having my future mapped out for me.
translation.de: Ich weiß, aber ich will keine durchgeplante Zukunft.

translation.en: No obligations, no one knows I'm part of the Harrison dynasty.
translation.de: Ungebunden, niemand weiß, dass ich zur Harrison-Dynastie gehöre.

translation.en: Your aunt worries about you. I know she's looking forward to--
translation.de: Deine Tante macht sich Sorgen um dich. Ich weiß, sie freut sich auf…

translation.en: The Gala is a thank-you to our board and benefactors,
translation.de: Die Gala ist ein Dankeschön an den Vorstand und die Wohltäter,

translation.en: and I will not serve them an over-salted entrée
translation.de: und ich serviere ihnen keinen versalzenen Hauptgang

translation.en: and dessert bars that taste as if they came from the day-old section of the supermarket.
translation.de: oder Dessert Bars, die schmecken wie die vom Vortag im Supermarkt.

translation.en: You quit? Fine.
And meanwhile, I will look for a caterer who understands the meaning of high-quality cuisine.
translation.de: In der Zwischenzeit suche ich Caterer, die hochwertige Kulinarik verstehen.

translation.en: Thank you. Goodbye.
We need a new caterer.
-Christmas Gala's in eight days, right? -I am well aware of that.
translation.de: -Die Gala ist in acht Tagen, oder? -Das ist mir bewusst.

translation.en: Robert, who else do we have in the file?
translation.de: Robert, welche Caterer gibt es noch?

translation.en: Oh, my. I appreciate your organizational abilities.
translation.de: Meine Güte. Zum Glück bist du so organisiert.

translation.en: So…
which shall we choose?
Hello?
Happy holidays. How can I help you?
translation.de: Frohe Festtage. Wie kann ich Ihnen helfen?

translation.en: Uh… I'm looking for Molly Frost.
I'm Molly.
I'm Jean Harrison of the Harrison Foundation.
translation.de: Ich bin Jean Harrison von der Harrison-Stiftung.

translation.en: Yes, of course. Your family's done incredible things for the community.
translation.de: Ja, klar. Ihre Familie hat viel für die Gemeinde getan.

translation.en: Your grant to the local school saved the arts program. All of the programs, really. It's incredible.
translation.de: Sie retteten die Kunstkurse der Schule. Und alle anderen. Unglaublich.

translation.en: What can I do for you, Mrs. Harrison?
I could've called, but I find it is important
translation.de: Ich hätte anrufen können, aber es ist wichtig,

translation.en: to see the catering premises for myself.
Understood. We have all our licenses and certifications.
translation.de: Alles klar. Wir haben alle Lizenzen und Zertifikate.

translation.en: Yes, I see that.
Every year we have a Christmas Gala with a dinner on December 23rd.
translation.de: Wir veranstalten immer am 23. Dezember eine Weihnachtsgala mit Dinner.

translation.en: -I know it's short notice. -I would love to.
Excellent.
Are you available to come for an interview this afternoon at three o'clock?
translation.de: Könnten Sie heute Nachmittag um 15 Uhr zur Vorstellung kommen?

translation.en: Oh, an interview?
I need to be assured that you can indeed create magical cuisine.
translation.de: Ich muss sichergehen, dass Sie wirklich Magisches kochen.

translation.en: Of course. I will be there.
Thank you for the opportunity.
No, thank you.
Jean Harrison might want us to cater the Harrison Foundation Christmas Gala.
translation.de: Eventuell übernehmen wir das Catering für die Harrison-Weihnachtsgala.

translation.en: -That's the biggest event of the year. -I know.
We have to be there at 3:00. I think she might want us to make her a meal.
translation.de: Wir müssen um 15 Uhr dort sein und ihr wohl was kochen.

translation.en: But what about the Christmas dessert
that we're catering for the senior citizen event this afternoon?
Right. That's today.
Okay. If you can do that on your own, maybe Cindy can help me.
translation.de: Ok. Wenn du das alleine schaffst, kann mir Cindy helfen.

translation.en: -Uh… -Oh, no. She's out of town.
You don't know him, but my friend Taylor is a fantastic sous chef
translation.de: Mein Freund Taylor ist ein toller Souschef

translation.en: and he's in between jobs right now.
-I'll just text him. -Yes, please.
He's one town away, so he's not that far.
-Great. -[phone chimes] He's free. Wow. Amazing.
-Okay, tell him to meet me there. -Okay.
Now I just have to figure out what to serve. Oh, you got this.
translation.de: -Mal überlegen, was ich anbiete. -Das kriegst du hin.

translation.en: You must be Molly. Lovely to meet you, Mr. Harrison.
Mr. Harrison passed many years ago.
translation.de: Mr. Harrison verstarb vor vielen Jahren.

translation.en: I'm Robert, the long-time, but not long-suffering, estate manager.
translation.de: Ich bin Robert, der langjährige, aber nicht leidende Gutsverwalter.

translation.en: -Please come in. -Thank you.
Wow. It's beautiful.
Jean decorated everything herself.
Let me show you the kitchen.
This is my dream kitchen.
Jean would like you to prepare her a three-course holiday meal.
translation.de: Jean möchte, dass Sie ein dreigängiges Festtagsessen zubereiten.

translation.en: You will, of course, be compensated for your time today.
translation.de: Natürlich werden Sie für die Zeit entschädigt.

translation.en: Any dietary restrictions?
None whatsoever, though she does have a certain fondness for chocolate.
translation.de: Keine. Aber sie hat eine gewisse Vorliebe für Schokolade.

translation.en: After my own heart.
When my sous chef arrives, will you send him in?
Certainly. Good luck.
Thank you.
[Molly] There you are. Finally.
-Finally? -Are your hands clean?
-Just washed 'em. -Great. You can finish mincing the celery.
Carrots need to be julienned, parsnips need to be peeled and chopped.
translation.de: Karotten stifteln, Pastinaken schälen und hacken.

translation.en: What are we making?
An heirloom tomato salad with lemon-thyme panko-crusted chicken and parsnip purée.
translation.de: Tomatensalat mit Huhn in Zitronen-Thymian- Panko-Panade und Pastinakenpüree.

translation.en: For dessert, a pistachio cranberry fudge brownie.
Yum. Hope I get to have some.
translation.de: Lecker. Ich hoffe, ich kriege was ab.

translation.en: Very funny.
Get to work. We don't have much time.
Yes, ma'am.
The celery needs to be minced.
Cut into very small pieces?
[Carson] Is that better? Who taught you how to hold a knife?
You move your hand up like that.
That's better.
-This needs to be perfect. -Why's that?
Didn't Christina tell you? This is for Jean Harrison.
translation.de: Hat Christina nichts gesagt? Das ist für Jean Harrison.

translation.en: She's fired nearly every catering company she's ever used.
translation.de: Sie hat fast alle anderen Caterer gefeuert.

translation.en: Apparently, she's impossible to please.
Is that so?
Who else hires a caterer to come to their house and cook as an interview?
translation.de: Wer sonst bittet Caterer um eine Vorstellung zu Hause?

translation.en: Well, I guess you didn't have to come.
Are you kidding? This dinner could make my career.
translation.de: Echt? Dieses Dinner kann meine Karriere ausmachen.

translation.en: I need this job.
Gotcha.
Your sous chef is here. He's washing his hands.
translation.de: Ihr Souschef ist da. Er wäscht sich die Hände.

translation.en: -Then who…? -Carson, what are you doing down here?
I was just coming in to get a snack, and I was put to work.
translation.de: Ich wollte einen Snack und wurde eingespannt.

translation.en: Your aunt would like to see you. Your aunt?
Wh-Who's your aunt? Not…
Jean Harrison. Yeah.
Look, I'm really sorry.
translation.de: Hör mal, es tut mir leid.

translation.en: I was just…
Everything looks delicious.
[Robert] Carson!
I'm sorry.
And good luck.
Is that Champagne vinegar?
Yes. I found some in the back of the pantry.
You should've used the grainy mustard.
And I think it needs a touch more garlic to balance out the lemon.
translation.de: Und es fehlt noch etwas Knoblauch zum Ausgleich für die Zitrone.

translation.en: You really know your flavoring agents. I have hosted many, many dinner parties over the years.
translation.de: -Sie kennen sich mit Aromen aus. -Ich habe viele Dinnerpartys gegeben.

translation.en: Oh, you're done? Would you like the dessert?
translation.de: Sie sind fertig? Möchten Sie Dessert?

translation.en: A brownie?
Yes. I adapted my grandmother's recipe. She used to make it every December.
translation.de: Ja. Eine Adaption des Rezepts meiner Oma. Sie buk den immer im Dezember.

translation.en: This is very good.
Thank you.
But it doesn't compare with my grandfather's Christmas walnut fudge.
translation.de: Aber nicht so gut wie der Walnuss-Fudge, den mein Großvater zu Weihnachten buk.

translation.en: If you have the recipe, I would be happy to make it for you.
translation.de: Wenn Sie das Rezept haben, backe ich ihn gern.

translation.en: Unfortunately, the recipe was never written down,
translation.de: Leider wurde das Rezept nie niedergeschrieben,

translation.en: and despite many attempts, no one has ever managed to re-create it.
translation.de: und die vielen Versuche, ihn zu nachzubacken, blieben erfolglos.

translation.en: I'm sorry if this was not to your taste. Oh, no. It was delicious.
translation.de: -Tut mir leid, dass der nicht schmeckte. -Oh nein. Er war köstlich.

translation.en: -Oh, so does that mean-- -Don is on the phone.
That's the president of my board. I must take this, if you'll excuse me?
Oh, okay. Uh, but the Gala?
Yes, I have another interview, and then I'll let you know my decision.
translation.de: Es kommt noch jemand zur Vorstellung. Sie bekommen Bescheid.

translation.en: Thank you.
Don, so good of you to get back to me.
Yes, I wanted to…
Uh, how'd it go?
I don't know. Thanks for your help earlier.
translation.de: Das weiß ich nicht. Danke für die Hilfe.

translation.en: Oh, I just walked in the kitchen. You put me to work.
translation.de: Ich kam nur rein. Du hast mich eingespannt.

translation.en: Look, I'm really sorry about that.
translation.de: Hör mal, das tut mir wirklich leid.

translation.en: I hope I didn't throw you off your rhythm too much. I was just trying to be helpful.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, ich brachte dich nicht aus dem Konzept. Ich wollte helfen.

translation.en: You're not gonna tell your aunt what I said, are you? That she's, uh, difficult and impossible to please?
translation.de: -Du sagst ihr nicht, was ich sagte, oder? -Dass sie schwierig und nie zufrieden ist?

translation.en: I didn't mean that. I never would've said that if I had known who you were.
translation.de: Das meinte ich nicht so. Ich wusste nicht, wer du bist.

translation.en: -I know. That's what everyone says. -[vehicle approaching]
I better go. Your next interview's here.
translation.de: Ich fahre. Da ist die nächste Vorstellung.

translation.en: Okay.
I've never met Taylor. I thought it was him.
I just can't believe it was her nephew.
translation.de: Unfassbar, dass das ihr Neffe war.

translation.en: If he tells Jean what I said, we're definitely not getting the job.
translation.de: Wenn er Jean sagt, was ich sagte, sind wir raus.

translation.en: I'm kinda curious now. So, you said his name was Carson?
translation.de: Ich bin jetzt neugierig. Sein Name ist also Carson?

translation.en: Yeah. What are you looking up?
Let's try this link.
Yeah, okay, so, "Since the Great Depression,
generations of Harrison family members have given back to the community
translation.de: halfen Generationen der Familie Harrison der Gemeinde,

translation.en: to help make a better future for all."
translation.de: eine bessere Zukunft für alle zu schaffen."

translation.en: I didn't realize the foundation went back that far.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, dass die Stiftung so alt ist.

translation.en: Huh. Here are photos from the Christmas Gala.
translation.de: Hier sind Fotos von der Weihnachtsgala.

translation.en: That's him.
He's cute. You can't tell me you didn't think he was attractive.
translation.de: Er ist süß. Sag nicht, du fandst ihn nicht attraktiv.

translation.en: -I didn't notice. -Really?
Yes. I was focused on making a three-course meal.
translation.de: Ich musste mich auf das Menü konzentrieren.

translation.en: Oh, okay. [laughs]
Don't worry, we'll hear from them soon.
translation.de: Keine Sorge, die melden sich bald.

translation.en: Oh! Getting the Harrison Gala dinner would be huge.
translation.de: Das Galadinner wäre eine große Sache.

translation.en: -I need this job. -Yeah.
Here's to hoping. We got this.
[Carson] Hi.
-Carson. -Am I disturbing you?
-Not at all. Come in. Sit down. -Thanks.
Where have you been hiding all evening?
translation.de: Wo warst du den ganzen Abend?

translation.en: I was just upstairs on the phone with my agent Isabella.
translation.de: Ich habe mit meiner Agentin Isabella telefoniert.

translation.en: She's planning my next gig. Is that right?
Don't worry, it's after Christmas. Good.
That's good.
So… how did the interviews with the caterers go?
translation.de: Und? Wie liefen die Vorstellungen der Caterer?

translation.en: They were both professional.
The food was fresh, delicious.
translation.de: Das Essen war frisch und köstlich.

translation.en: The platings and presentation were both excellent,
translation.de: Die Teller waren bei beiden exzellent angerichtet,

translation.en: but I'm leaning toward the Bradford Bros.
translation.de: aber ich tendiere zu den Bradford Bros.

translation.en: -Uh… Why's that? -They've been in the business longer.
They have more experience with dinners like this.
translation.de: Sie haben mehr Erfahrung mit solchen Dinners.

translation.en: I see.
You know…
I thought Molly's Menu Magic was impressive myself.
translation.de: Ich fand Molly's Menu Magic beeindruckend.

translation.en: Really? Why do you say that?
-Well, I saw her in the kitchen-- -Molly?
Yes, Molly, in the kitchen, and I was impressed by her technique.
translation.de: Ja, Molly, in der Küche, und mich beeindruckte ihre Technik.

translation.en: -Hmm. -Her attention to detail.
She made every little thing look perfect.
-I thought you would appreciate that. -Mm-hmm.
After all, experience doesn't always equal energy and enthusiasm.
translation.de: Schließlich wiegt Erfahrung nicht immer Energie und Enthusiasmus auf.

translation.en: You may be right.
Molly's Menu Magic it is.
Good.
Carson, I am very happy to see you finally taking an interest in the Gala.
translation.de: Carson, ich bin sehr froh, dass dich endlich die Gala interessiert.

translation.en: Well, you know me, I'm happy to help when I'm in town.
translation.de: Tja, du kennst mich. Ich helfe immer gern.

translation.en: Well then, here you go.
-What-- -Take over planning the dinner.
Aunt Jean, I've got no experience event planning.
translation.de: Ich habe keine Erfahrung in Eventplanung.

translation.en: I just take the photographs.
You're smart, you know what to do.
translation.de: Du bist klug, du weißt, was zu tun ist.

translation.en: I have faith in you.
What about Stephanie? She's normally your second in command.
translation.de: Und Stephanie? Sie ist deine Stellvertreterin.

translation.en: Your cousin has enough on her plate, plus a new baby,
translation.de: Deine Cousine hat genug zu tun und ein Baby,

translation.en: and honestly, this year I'm just feeling…
translation.de: und dieses Jahr fühle ich mich einfach…

translation.en: overwhelmed.
I can't do this by myself anymore.
translation.de: Ich kann das nicht mehr allein.

translation.en: Okay.
I'll take over the dinner. Thank you.
I will give Molly a call. You can take it from there.
translation.de: Ich rufe Molly an. Dann übernimmst du.

translation.en: All right.
Carson, you know how important this dinner is.
translation.de: Carson, du weißt, wie wichtig dieses Dinner ist.

translation.en: Yes, I know.
But, Aunt Jean, this doesn't mean that I'm gonna be working for the foundation full-time, okay?
translation.de: Aber Tante Jean, das heißt nicht, dass ich in Vollzeit für die Stiftung arbeite.

translation.en: Our focus will be on making this Christmas Gala the best that it can be.
translation.de: Unser Fokus ist, diese Weihnachtsgala so gut wie möglich hinzukriegen.

translation.en: We can discuss your future role at another time.
translation.de: Deine Zukunft können wir ein andermal besprechen.

translation.en: Who are these for?
Oh, uh, Tammy. Bookstore.
Oh. Yeah, I'm prepping for the big art gallery holiday party tonight.
translation.de: Oh. Ja, ich bereite alles für die Party in der Kunstgalerie heute vor.

translation.en: It's gonna be like 200 people, you know?
Wow. That's great.
Yeah.
Have you heard from Jean Harrison? Not yet, but, uh…
translation.de: -Hast du was von Jean Harrison gehört? -Noch nicht, aber…

translation.en: Look, she was swooning over our lobster gnocchi, so…
translation.de: Sie hat so von unseren Hummer-Gnocchi geschwärmt…

translation.en: I wouldn't hold my breath, no offense.
translation.de: Mach dir keine Hoffnungen. Nicht böse gemeint.

translation.en: None taken. I'm sure it was divine.
translation.de: Schon gut. Die waren sicher göttlich.

translation.en: -Here. Allow me. -Thanks.
Excuse me. Molly Frost. Hello?
Yes. Okay.
That is fantastic. Thank you, Jean.
Yes, I will be there.
Thank you again.
I better go. I have a big gala to plan.
translation.de: Ich muss eine große Gala planen.

translation.en: Good luck with your party tonight.
Yes!
Welcome back, and congratulations.
Thanks. Uh, this is for Jean.
translation.de: Danke. Der hier ist für Jean.

translation.en: Walnut fudge.
Feel free to help yourself.
I'm not one for sweets, though I do enjoy a nice gingerbread every now and then.
translation.de: Ich mag nichts Süßes, aber ab und zu genehmige ich mir einen Lebkuchen.

translation.en: Please, come in.
Excuse me, Carson. Ms. Molly is here for the catering meeting.
translation.de: Ms. Molly ist wegen des Caterings hier.

translation.en: It is good to see you again. I thought I was meeting Jean.
translation.de: -Schön, dich wiederzusehen. -Ich dachte, ich treffe Jean.

translation.en: Actually, Aunt Jean is letting me oversee the food this year.
translation.de: Tante Jean übergab mir die Verantwortung für das Essen dieses Jahr.

translation.en: -Oh. -I'll leave you two to it.
-Thank you. -Thank you, Robert.
We didn't officially meet the other day. I'm Carson.
translation.de: Wir haben uns nicht vorgestellt. Ich bin Carson.

translation.en: -Uh, shall we get started? -Yes. Please have a seat.
Oh, those are cute.
Oh, yeah. My aunt collects them.
translation.de: Oh ja. Meine Tante sammelt die.

translation.en: She's got, like, 200 in this house.
translation.de: Sie hat 200 oder so davon im Haus.

translation.en: Wow, it's quite a collection.
-Can I get you anything to drink? -I'm fine. Thank you.
Have you decided on a menu?
-Not yet. -What about the budget?
Uh… Does that matter?
It usually helps determine the menu options.
Well, then it's a very important question, I'll find out.
translation.de: Dann ist es wichtig. Ich finde es heraus.

translation.en: To give me an idea, what did you serve last year?
translation.de: Nur als Anhaltspunkt, was gab's letztes Jahr?

translation.en: Prime rib and, uh…
No, uh, chicken and fish, I think,
translation.de: Ach nein, Huhn und Fisch, glaube ich,

translation.en: and a lot of tiny little puffy, fancy things.
Buffet or seated dinner?
Look, the truth is, I've been to every single one of these Galas
translation.de: Die Wahrheit ist, ich war bei jeder Gala,

translation.en: since I was five years old, and they're all kind of running together.
translation.de: seit ich fünf war, und irgendwie verschwimmen sie.

translation.en: Okay, how many people are you expecting? I will have to get back to you on that too.
translation.de: -Ok. Wie viele Gäste kommen? -Das kann ich auch erst später sagen.

translation.en: What about the venue? The dinner space?
What about it?
-Where's dinner happening? -It's the same place every year.
translation.de: -Wo findet das Dinner statt? -Am selben Ort wie immer.

translation.en: Which is where?
It's the living room, but they use it for entertaining.
translation.de: Im Wohnzimmer. Aber es dient als Empfangsraum für Gäste.

translation.en: Oh, do you wanna have a look yourself?
translation.de: Oh, willst du es dir selbst ansehen?

translation.en: -Yeah, that would be helpful. -Good.
Uh, it's back upstairs.
Okay, here it is.
Um… We're gonna have all the furniture moved out
and we're gonna have tables brought in.
It's beautiful.
I hear your Gala is the Christmas party of the year.
translation.de: Die Gala ist wohl die Weihnachtsparty des Jahres.

translation.en: Yeah. I suppose it is.
The dinner doubles as a fundraiser for the foundation.
translation.de: Das Dinner dient auch als Spendenaktion der Stiftung.

translation.en: Essentially, it's another day in the office, just with fancier food.
translation.de: Es ist im Grunde ein Bürotag, aber mit noblem Essen.

translation.en: Maybe we can change that with the menu.
translation.de: Das könnten wir mit dem Menü ändern.

translation.en: Holiday traditions unite family and friends.
Food brings back memories, brings people together.
translation.de: Essen bringt Erinnerungen zurück und Leute zusammen.

translation.en: I like that.
Food is more than just food.
Exactly.
So we don't know the menu, budget, or number of people?
translation.de: Wir kennen Menü, Budget und Anzahl der Gäste nicht?

translation.en: Nope. But we do know the date: December 23rd.
translation.de: Nein. Aber das Datum steht fest. 23. Dezember.

translation.en: Oh, well, that's something.
He was gonna get more details and get back to us. We need more icing.
translation.de: Er will sich erkundigen und melden. Wir brauchen mehr Glasur.

translation.en: Oh.
-There's more in the back. I'll get it. -Okay.
-Come in. -Hey.
Rough afternoon?
-Occupational hazard. -Ah.
Moll, I don't think we have any… Oh, this is Christina.
translation.de: -Moll, ich glaube, wir haben keine… -Oh, das ist Christina.

translation.en: -Hi. -You must be Carson.
Hi. I've heard so much about you. I'm flattered, I think.
translation.de: -Ich habe viel von dir gehört. -Ich fühle mich geschmeichelt.

translation.en: We are beyond honored to be catering your foundation's Christmas Gala dinner.
translation.de: Wir fühlen uns sehr geehrt, das Catering der Gala zu übernehmen.

translation.en: Harrison family, legendary. Thanks for saying that.
Do you want something to drink or, or eat, or…
translation.de: Willst du was trinken oder essen…

translation.en: -Actually, we need more icing? -Oh, no. I'm good. Thanks, though.
-Um, yeah, I'll-- -Good to meet you, Christina.
You too.
-So… -So…
You first.
-Do you have any more information? -Uh, yes.
So, we are expecting 25 guests, approximately.
Okay. Budget? The high end.
-Menu? -Now that is TBD.
I thought we could discuss it over peppermint hot chocolate, my treat.
translation.de: Besprechen wir das bei einem Pfefferminzkakao. Ich lade ein.

translation.en: -I don't really-- -Strictly professional.
It's my guilty pleasure when I'm in town.
Sure. I'll grab my coat and clean up.
translation.de: Gut. Ich hole meinen Mantel und mache mich sauber.

translation.en: -[Christmas music playing] -[Santa] Ho ho ho!
-Thanks. -You're welcome.
-You've had one of these before? -Yes. Every year since I was a kid.
translation.de: -Hast du den mal getrunken? -Ja. Jedes Jahr seit meiner Kindheit.

translation.en: -Well, then you know. -[both laugh]
I wait all year for this. [laughs] Where are you the rest of the year?
translation.de: -Ich warte das ganze Jahr darauf. -Wo bist du sonst?

translation.en: Everywhere and nowhere.
I'm an event photographer.
Interesting.
Do you work for a particular magazine?
No, I freelance. My agent finds me work all over.
translation.de: Nein, ich bin Freelancer. Meine Agentin besorgt mir Aufträge.

translation.en: One day, it's a fashion show in Paris,
translation.de: An einem Tag eine Modeschau in Paris,

translation.en: the next it's an engagement party on a yacht in Ibiza,
translation.de: am nächsten eine Verlobung auf einer Jacht vor Ibiza,

translation.en: then it's a product tech launch party in Silicon Valley.
translation.de: dann eine Tech-Premierenfeier im Silicon Valley.

translation.en: Blah, blah, blah.
No, it sounds glamorous. Trust me, it's far from glamorous.
translation.de: -Das klingt glamourös. -Glaub mir, das ist es gar nicht.

translation.en: It's long hours, and I'm never in the same place for more than a week.
translation.de: Lange Arbeitstage, und ich bin nie länger als eine Woche irgendwo.

translation.en: So maintaining friendships…
it can be difficult. Yeah, that would be hard.
So how did you get into event photography?
Uh, it started as a favor for a friend's graduation party,
translation.de: Es begann mit einem Gefallen für die Abschlussparty eines Freundes

translation.en: and then it grew from there.
But I… I really love nature photography.
translation.de: Aber ich liebe eigentlich die Naturfotografie.

translation.en: I wanna do more of that, but it doesn't really pay well.
translation.de: Das würde ich gern machen, aber die Bezahlung ist mies.

translation.en: There's not a lot of work.
Oh, speaking of work, I had some ideas I wanted to show you.
translation.de: Stichwort Aufträge. Ich habe da ein paar Ideen.

translation.en: Yeah, bring it on.
Okay.
For the hors d'oeuvres, I have a few options.
translation.de: Für die Horsd'œuvres habe ich mehrere Optionen.

translation.en: So, these are the mini-pesto and goat cheese appetizers.
Wow, they look great.
-[Carson] Yeah, can I? -Yeah.
[Carson] Yeah, everything looks great. That's…
Truth is, this isn't really my area of expertise.
translation.de: In Wahrheit ist das nicht gerade mein Fachgebiet.

translation.en: -I figured as much. -Yeah.
I'm just gonna mess this up. You're the expert. I trust you.
translation.de: Ich vermassle es nur. Du bist die Expertin. Ich vertraue dir.

translation.en: What about Jean?
Well, don't worry. I'm gonna tell her I approve your menu choices, which I do.
translation.de: Keine Sorge. Ich sage ihr, ich genehmige deine Auswahl.

translation.en: Okay, that was easy.
Oh, and feel free to use our kitchen.
translation.de: Oh, und benutze ruhig unsere Küche.

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate that.
-That's it? You're leaving? -Yeah, I have a lot of work to do.
translation.de: -Das war's? Du gehst schon? -Ja, ich habe viel zu tun.

translation.en: Thank you for the peppermint hot chocolate.
[Carson] You're welcome.
-Bye. -[Molly] Bye.
Oh, careful with the decorations.
Thanks, just put them over there, and we'll arrange them later.
translation.de: Danke, bitte dahin. Wir stellen sie später richtig hin.

translation.en: Hi. Do you need a hand?
I think everything is almost in.
translation.de: Ich glaube, wir haben fast alles.

translation.en: How did it go with the caterers?
translation.de: Wie lief es mit den Caterern?

translation.en: Oh, good. Yeah, she has fantastic ideas.
translation.de: Oh, gut. Sie hat fantastische Ideen.

translation.en: We will need at least five different types of cocktail appetizers,
translation.de: Wir brauchen mindestens fünf verschiedene Appetithäppchen,

translation.en: including a vegetarian option for our newest board member, Anne.
translation.de: darunter was Vegetarisches für Anne, unsere Neue im Vorstand.

translation.en: I will let her know.
Aunt Jean, look, I don't want you to worry about anything.
translation.de: Tante Jean, ich will nicht, dass du dir Sorgen machst.

translation.en: I promise, it's gonna be fantastic. Oh, regards to Molly.
translation.de: -Ich verspreche, es wird fantastisch. -Oh, Gruß an Molly.

translation.en: It was good.
But it was not my Grandfather Fred's Christmas fudge.
translation.de: Aber es war nicht der Weihnachtsfudge meines Großvaters.

translation.en: -What about his Christmas fudge? -Did I never tell you this?
translation.de: -Was ist mit seinem Fudge? -Habe ich das nie erwähnt?

translation.en: Your great grandfather worked long hours,
translation.de: Dein Urgroßvater hat immer viel gearbeitet,

translation.en: but every year before Christmas, he would take off a day
translation.de: aber er nahm sich immer einen Tag frei,

translation.en: to make his Christmas walnut fudge for all us kids.
translation.de: um zu Weihnachten für uns Kinder einen Walnuss-Fudge zu backen.

translation.en: He lived in York County, Maine, then.
translation.de: Damals lebte er in York County, Maine.

translation.en: I never knew that.
Whenever my parents weren't looking,
Grandpa would sneak extra fudge to all us kids.
translation.de: gab er uns Kindern heimlich noch mehr Fudge.

translation.en: Just thinking about it brings back the fondest memories of my childhood.
translation.de: Wenn ich daran denke, kommen schöne Kindheitserinnerungen hoch.

translation.en: Well, 'cause food can be more than just food.
translation.de: Weil Essen mehr als Essen sein kann.

translation.en: Yes, it really can be.
translation.de: Ja, das kann es wirklich sein.

translation.en: The art dealer called.
The three paintings he's been holding for us have sold.
translation.de: Die drei Gemälde, die er zurückhielt, sind verkauft.

translation.en: Uh, the paintings you were gonna auction off at the Gala? [Robert] Mm-hmm. Well, I won't be using that gallery again.
translation.de: -Die du versteigern wolltest? -Diese Galerie beauftrage ich nicht mehr.

translation.en: He apologizes for the inconvenience and hopes you'll find something else for the fundraiser.
translation.de: Er entschuldigt sich und hofft, du findest für die Spendengala etwas anderes.

translation.en: As much as I love the Christmas Gala,
translation.de: So sehr ich die Weihnachtsgala liebe,

translation.en: I am not going to miss dealing with all of this when I retire.
translation.de: das werde ich nach meinem Rückzug nie vermissen.

translation.en: I'll have to call Don, the president of our board.
translation.de: Ich muss Don anrufen, unseren Vorstandsvorsitzenden.

translation.en: Robert, you always anticipate my needs.
translation.de: Robert, du weißt immer im Voraus, was ich brauche.

translation.en: Excuse me.
-She's retiring? -Not yet.
But she's been thinking a lot about it lately.
translation.de: Aber sie denkt oft darüber nach.

translation.en: No one is gonna come close to filling her shoes.
translation.de: Niemand wird in ihre Fußstapfen treten können.

translation.en: Especially me, Robert.
I'll see you later.
-Morning. -Hi.
I thought I'd take you up on your offer to use the kitchen, if the chef doesn't mind.
translation.de: Ich wollte dein Angebot annehmen und eure Küche benutzen.

translation.en: No, not at all.
My aunt had someone leave meals in the fridge for the rest of the day.
translation.de: Das Essen meiner Tante ist schon vorbereitet.

translation.en: That's efficient.
She's surprisingly low maintenance when it comes to herself.
translation.de: Wenn es um sie selbst geht, ist sie nicht anspruchsvoll.

translation.en: -I never said-- -I'm giving you a hard time.
-Can I grab something for you? -Yeah, that'd be great. Thank you.
translation.de: -Soll ich beim Tragen helfen? -Das wäre toll. Danke.

translation.en: Sorry. I…
It's in the back seat.
Okay.
You're right about food bringing back memories.
translation.de: Du hast recht, dass Essen Erinnerungen weckt.

translation.en: I was talking to my Aunt Jean last night and she was…
translation.de: Gestern sprach ich mit meiner Tante.

translation.en: she was telling me about her childhood, and apparently,
translation.de: Sie erzählte mir von ihrer Kindheit, und meine Familie

translation.en: my family is from York County, Maine.
translation.de: kommt wohl aus York County, Maine.

translation.en: Maine. Really? That's cool.
Did she say anything about the fudge?
translation.de: Hat sie was zum Fudge gesagt?

translation.en: She liked it, and she appreciated you tried.
translation.de: Sie mochte ihn und dankt dir für den Versuch.

translation.en: I have more recipes.
That's really sweet of you, literally.
translation.de: Das ist süß von dir. Wortwörtlich.

translation.en: But, uh, you don't have to go to the trouble.
-Feels like a challenge now. -Then I wish you good luck.
So, what are we making today?
Holiday cheesecake bars and almond sugar cookies.
Put me to work, if you dare. Are your hands clean?
translation.de: -Spann mich ein, wenn du dich traust. -Sind die Hände sauber?

translation.en: Thank you anyway. I appreciate your getting back to me.
translation.de: Aber trotzdem danke für den Rückruf.

translation.en: And season's greetings to you too.
I take it that wasn't good news. Unfortunately, no, it wasn't.
translation.de: -Das waren wohl keine guten Neuigkeiten. -Leider nein.

translation.en: Sorry to hear that. I am having zero luck.
translation.de: -Das tut mir leid. -Ich habe gar kein Glück.

translation.en: Everyone has already donated their big-ticket items for the holiday season.
translation.de: Alle haben bereits ihre wertvollen Posten gespendet.

translation.en: -Something will turn up. -I hope so.
translation.de: -Es findet sich schon was. -Das hoffe ich.

translation.en: -What have you got there? -Oh, it just arrived.
translation.de: -Was hast du da? -Oh, ist gerade gekommen.

translation.en: It's from the children at the Harrison Community Center. Perhaps it'll cheer you up.
translation.de: Von den Kindern aus dem Gemeindezentrum. Könnte dich aufmuntern.

translation.en: -[Jean] Aww! -[Robert laughs]
This is why we do what we do, Robert.
This makes it all worthwhile.
-I'll have it framed for you, if you like. -Thank you.
translation.de: -Ich lasse es einrahmen, wenn du magst. -Danke.

translation.en: Oh, by the way, have you seen Carson?
translation.de: Ach, übrigens, hast du Carson gesehen?

translation.en: I've seen not hide nor hair of him all day.
translation.de: Ich kann ihn heute nirgends finden.

translation.en: He is in the kitchen helping the caterer bake Christmas cookies.
translation.de: Er ist in der Küche und hilft beim Backen von Weihnachts-Cookies.

translation.en: He's baking? There's a first for everything.
translation.de: -Er backt? -Für alles gibt es ein erstes Mal.

translation.en: Well, I'm glad he's taking this seriously.
translation.de: Ich freue mich, dass er das ernst nimmt.

translation.en: Maybe it will help him see how much the foundation means.
translation.de: Vielleicht erkennt er so, wie viel die Stiftung bedeutet.

translation.en: Hopefully.
Hope you didn't have to cancel any Christmas plans to do the Gala.
translation.de: Ich hoffe, die Gala ruiniert keine Pläne.

translation.en: -My family did go on holiday without me. -What?
They went without you?
Yeah, but I needed to stay in town.
translation.de: Ja, aber ich musste in der Stadt bleiben.

translation.en: Making Molly's Menu Magic a success is my number-one priority right now.
translation.de: Der Erfolg von Molly's Menu Magic hat gerade höchste Priorität.

translation.en: And your significant other?
My significant other is business right now.
translation.de: Mein Partner ist gerade das Geschäft.

translation.en: Well, I can relate to that.
-Are you close with your family? -Yeah.
My parents are still very much in love after all these years.
translation.de: Meine Eltern sind immer noch sehr verliebt.

translation.en: You're lucky.
You're lucky too, you're part of the famous Harrison family.
translation.de: Du auch. Du gehörst zur Familie Harrison.

translation.en: -You're like a local celebrity. -Yeah.
I think they think of me as the rebel of the family, though.
translation.de: Aber sie sehen mich wohl eher als den Rebellen.

translation.en: -Why is that? -You know, can you…
Braiding cookies is kind of complicated. [laughs]
-Can you give me a hand? -You've almost got it.
-Wow, I don't know. -Here. Okay.
-The left goes over the middle. -Mm-hmm.
And then the right goes over the middle.
-Try not to flatten the dough. -Right.
-There you go. -Kinda like that?
Yeah.
-Okay. -Perfect.
-And then you bend the top. -Like that?
It's a tri-color candy cane. You're a genius.
translation.de: Eine dreifarbige Zuckerstange. Du bist ein Genie.

translation.en: Well, not quite, but I'll take it.
Hey, I saw that.
No, I said you're a genius. Mm, these are really good.
translation.de: Ich sagte ja, du bist ein Genie. Schmeckt echt gut.

translation.en: I see what you're doing. Your charm will not work on me.
translation.de: Ich durchschaue dich. Aber Charme hilft nicht.

translation.en: You think I'm charming?
-I'm not gonna tell you what I think. -Okay, I won't ask then.
translation.de: -Ich sage nicht, was ich denke. -Ok, ich frage nicht.

translation.en: -What's next? -Okay.
That goes on the tray, and then we'll sprinkle it with my super secret cookie seasoning.
translation.de: Das kommt aufs Blech. Dann streuen wir supergeheime Aromen rauf.

translation.en: Super secret, do tell?
The secret is in the blend, and that I will never tell.
translation.de: Die Mischung ist das Geheimnis. Die verrate ich nicht.

translation.en: -I'll get it out of you somehow. -No, never.
It's empty.
I'll refill.
Oh, no.
Christina used the rest, and this was the last container.
translation.de: Christina hat wohl den letzten Behälter benutzt.

translation.en: Can you make more?
Yeah, but I'll have to go to the countryside.
translation.de: Ja, aber dafür muss ich aufs Land.

translation.en: -If I leave now, I might have time. -I'll get my keys.
translation.de: -Wenn, dann muss ich jetzt los. -Ich hole die Schlüssel.

translation.en: I'm sure you're busy. I could have driven myself.
translation.de: Du hast sicher viel zu tun. Ich hätte selbst fahren können.

translation.en: It's no problem. I love a new adventure.
translation.de: Kein Problem. Ich liebe neue Abenteuer.

translation.en: Is that what makes you the outsider of the family?
translation.de: Bist du deshalb der Außenseiter der Familie?

translation.en: [chuckles] Probably.
You and your aunt seem close. Oh, we are.
translation.de: -Du und deine Tante, ihr steht euch nahe. -Oh ja.

translation.en: Aunt Jean never had children of her own,
translation.de: Tante Jean hatte nie eigene Kinder.

translation.en: but she always treated me like I was her son.
translation.de: Aber sie hat mich immer wie ihren Sohn behandelt.

translation.en: -It's nice that you have each other. -Yeah.
Yeah, it is.
Though, sometimes I think she wishes I was more like my cousins.
translation.de: Aber sie wünscht wohl, ich wäre wie meine Cousinen.

translation.en: They all went to Ivy League Schools, earned their MBAs, work for the foundation.
translation.de: Sie machten ihren MBA an Elite-Unis, arbeiten für die Stiftung.

translation.en: I imagine it would be hard not having separation between family and the family business.
translation.de: Es ist sicher schwer, wenn Familie und Geschäft nicht getrennt sind.

translation.en: Yeah, especially when you're a Harrison.
Professionally, I go by Jacob, my middle name.
translation.de: Im Beruf heiße ich Jacob, mein Mittelname.

translation.en: Makes it easier.
The Harrison name is so renowned. Doesn't it make you proud?
translation.de: Der Name Harrison hat einen guten Ruf. Macht dich das nicht stolz?

translation.en: Oh, yeah.
Yeah, I'm really proud.
But…
when people find out you're a Harrison, they treat you differently.
translation.de: Als Harrison wird man anders behandelt.

translation.en: That's partly why I didn't tell you who I was when I met you in the kitchen.
translation.de: Zum Teil sagte ich dir deshalb damals in der Küche nichts.

translation.en: I wonder what you would have done if you knew who I was.
translation.de: Was hättest du gemacht, hättest du es gewusst?

translation.en: -I would have kicked you out. -[laughs]
Fair enough.
We need to make a quick detour.
Wow, how did you know this was here?
Well, I drove past it the other day. So did I. I never saw it.
translation.de: -Ich bin hier neulich vorbeigefahren. -Ich auch. Aber ich habe es nie gesehen.

translation.en: It's beautiful.
Yeah. Yeah, it is.
Sometimes it's nice to just slow down.
I worry about the future so much, I have to remind myself to just be here in the present moment.
translation.de: Ich sorge mich so sehr um die Zukunft, dass ich vergesse, im Jetzt zu leben.

translation.en: It's one of the first things to learn about photography,
translation.de: Das lernte ich durch die Fotografie.

translation.en: to just stop and look so I could really see.
translation.de: Anzuhalten und mich umzusehen, um wirklich was zu sehen.

translation.en: It's actually good advice.
Sometimes I'm so focused on building my career,
translation.de: Ich bin so auf meine Karriere fixiert,

translation.en: I forget why I got into it in the first place.
translation.de: dass ich vergesse, warum ich das tue.

translation.en: Why did you?
For my love of food, and bringing people together.
translation.de: Ich liebe Essen und will Menschen zusammenbringen.

translation.en: That's nice.
May I?
Uh… sure.
Beautiful.
What did you say?
Nothing, it's just a beautiful day.
translation.de: Nichts. Heute ist ein schöner Tag.

translation.en: -Thomas! -[Thomas laughs]
-Hi. -You made it.
-It's nice to see you. -You too.
-Who is your friend? -This is Carson.
Thomas is an old friend and veteran.
translation.de: Thomas ist ein alter Freund und Veteran.

translation.en: It's very good to meet you, sir, and thank you for your service.
translation.de: Angenehm, Sir, und danke für Ihren Dienst.

translation.en: Appreciate it. Just working on your order.
translation.de: Danke. Ich arbeite an der Bestellung.

translation.en: -I'll ring the bell when it's ready. -Great.
Sir, do you mind if I take some photographs of your property? He's a professional photographer.
translation.de: -Sir, darf ich hier fotografieren? -Er ist ein professioneller Fotograf.

translation.en: Sure. Go ahead. Anything but the shed.
translation.de: Klar. Immer zu. Aber nicht den Schuppen.

translation.en: -It's a mess. -Fair enough.
-Do you need any help? -No, I got it.
You might keep an eye on your young man, make sure he doesn't wander too far.
translation.de: Pass auf, dass dein junger Mann nicht zu weit weg wandert.

translation.en: Oh, no, no. We're not together. He's an employer.
translation.de: Oh, wir sind kein Paar. Er ist ein Auftraggeber.

translation.en: Oh, all right, then. All right.
-Thanks. -See you in a bit.
Hey.
It's so beautiful here, especially during Christmas.
translation.de: Es ist so schön hier. Vor allem zur Weihnachtszeit.

translation.en: Yeah. It really is.
-So how do you know Thomas? -We always got our Christmas tree here.
translation.de: -Woher kennst du Thomas? -Wir kauften hier immer unseren Baum.

translation.en: His wife used to run the farmer's market in the village.
translation.de: Seine Frau leitete den Bauernmarkt im Dorf.

translation.en: When she passed, he got rid of the shop,
translation.de: Als sie starb, verkaufte er den Laden.

translation.en: and now he sells everything from his house.
translation.de: Jetzt verkauft er alles bei sich zu Hause.

translation.en: -Well, he seems like a really nice guy. -He is.
translation.de: -Er scheint sehr nett zu sein. -Das ist er.
